page.title: 18PLACE NAMES
page.content: ORIGIN OF PLACE NAMES :_ {STANLEY PLACE}-BUILT ON SITE OF CADOXTON LODGE WHERE SIR H.M.STANLEY STAYED FOR SOME TIME. {GLYN CLYDACH}- VALLEY OF RIVER CLYDACH {CLYDACH }- STONY BED {BRYNCOCH }- RED HILL {GLYNFELIN } - VALLEY OF THE MILL {PLAS NEWYDD }- NEW MANSION {TY-LLWYD }- GREY HOUSE { {BLAENHONDDAN}- SOURCE OF THE RIVER HONDDAN {GILFACH }- NOOK CORNER {ERWR SAETHAU}- THE ACRE OF THE ARROWS {PANT GLAS }- BLUE (OR GREEN) VALLEY {LLWYN ERCH }- SPECKLED BUSH {MARCH HYWEL} - MARCH-STALLION(A GREAT STRONG HORSE), SO{MARCH HYWEL}PROBABLY MEANS HYWEL'S GREAT MOUNTAIN. {DRUMAU } - RIDGE {DARRAN } - DRY HILL, SLOPE {LLANGATWG } - LLAN-CHURCH GATWG-ST.
